name: Resonance Identity Validation (kappa = pi/24)
description: Validation of the theoretical derivation of kappa from the 4D resonance condition K(4) * kappa = pi.

hypothesis.H0: The mass hierarchy slope kappa is not equal to pi/24 within 0.1% relative error.
hypothesis.H1: The mass hierarchy slope kappa matches pi/24 with < 0.1% error, satisfying the gravitational resonance identity.

data_requirements.description: Fermion mass data and SSoT kappa theoretical value.

test_method: Comparison of theoretical kappa (pi/24) against regression estimates from the latest fermion mass hierarchy data.
